ch.ethz.inf.asl13.user40.client

Class MessagePasser

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.ethz.inf.asl13.user40.client.MessagingServiceClient
      • ch.ethz.inf.asl13.user40.client.MessagePasser

  • public final class MessagePasser
extends MessagingServiceClient
    A one way client that sends a message and passes it on to a randomly selected other client.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void beforeSendingMessage(Message message)
      Changes the receiver to a random one of the list of chat partners.
      static void main(String[] args)
      Entry point for the application.

      • Methods inherited from class ch.ethz.inf.asl13.user40.client.MessagingServiceClient

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • beforeSendingMessage

        protected void beforeSendingMessage(Message message)
        Changes the receiver to a random one of the list of chat partners.
        Overrides:
        beforeSendingMessage in class MessagingServiceClient
        Parameters:
        message - The message that is subject to being sent.

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
        Entry point for the application. The first argument identifies this MessagePasser. All further arguments, there musst be at least one, identify the chat partners this MessagePasser sends messages to. If the list of chat partners contains this MessagePasser's ID, it will be silently ignored.
